casebody.data:
Brandy Renee FLOWERS
v.
Pitt County District Court Judge Wendy HAZELTON No. 129P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Brandy Renee Flowers, for Flowers, Brandy Renee

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 30th of April 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Pitt County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
